comments:
The Wharton Senior Capstone is a for-credit, interactive business simulation that provides Wharton seniors with the opportunity to draw on their business knowledge—finance, management, marketing, leadership, and social responsibility—while formulating and executing business strategy in a competitive, team-based environment.
The Senior Capstone was called a “valuable addition to [education] at Wharton.” The course emphasized “teamwork and ethics” and gave students a great opportunity to combine “soft-skills and… analytical skills.” The “amount learned in business acumen was realistic,” and nearly all students described this course as an incredibly fun, rewarding, and valuable one.
Reviews for the Senior Capstone did not specifically mention Professor Fader. Students mentioned that the teaching team and discussion were “insightful” and every review highlighted that the course was a great experience.
The Senior Capstone is an elective credit. Students would recommend that their peers take this course.
